server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.server.AbstractServer
      • server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class Server
extends ocsf.server.AbstractServer
    The Server class handle all the server-client communication and transfer the data to the DatabaseController for saving in DB * @author -------Group 9-------- Arik Zagdon, Dvir ben simon, Aviel Turgeman, Shenhav Hezi, Yaakov Shitrit

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static List<String> connectedUsers
      Variable that hold all the connected users in the system
      private DatabaseController databaseController
      Store database controller instance created by the constructor, in order to make transaction with database.
      private static Map<String,List<ExamExtension>> examsExtensions
      Map for exam time extensions
      private static Map<String,ExamProcess> examsInProcess
      Map for exams in process
      private static boolean isConnected
      Indicate if the server is connected
      private ServerEventListener serverListener
      Server event listener in order to handle events that occurred by server, send to server user interface log.
      private static Map<String,List<StudentInExam>> studentInExam
      map for students in exam
      private static SubjectCourseCollection subjectCourseCollection
      Value that hold the user, use to login and and open appropriate menu
